entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -8.8Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
